items.sentence: Tom and Mary are dancing in the grand ballroom.
Unless I'm mistaken, I've seen that man before.
It's not likely Tom will ever admit he's wrong.
Tom didn't recognize the song Mary was singing.
I have a friend whose father is a veterinarian.
Please promise me that you'll keep this secret.
I'm just going to run down to buy some tickets.
As a rule, I go to school before eight o'clock.
The man couldn't so much as write his own name.
Don't bring that dirty dog through the kitchen.
How much time do you spend shopping every week?
Tom spent all morning looking for his passport.
My wife spends a lot more on clothes than I do.
You should spend some time thinking about that.
Tom spent more money on that than he should've.
I certainly do hope you've learned your lesson.
I hope that nobody thinks that it was my fault.
It's about time for you to get another haircut.
Would you like me to thread the needle for you?
Road signs ought to be visible from a distance.
